remarks: Univariate polynomial evaluation maps (multiplicative) group sums to group sums.  (Contributed by AV, 15-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evl1gsumadd.q $e |- Q = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1gsumadd.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1gsumadd.w $e |- W = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1gsumadd.p $e |- P = ( R ^s K ) $.
evl1gsumadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
evl1gsumadd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
evl1gsumadd.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. N ) -> Y e. B ) $.
evl1gsumadd.n $e |- ( ph -> N C_ NN0 ) $.
evl1gsummul.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` W ) $.
evl1gsummul.g $e |- G = ( mulGrp ` W ) $.
evl1gsummul.h $e |- H = ( mulGrp ` P ) $.
evl1gsummul.f $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. N |-> Y ) finSupp .1. ) $.
evl1gsummul $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( G gsum ( x e. N |-> Y ) ) ) = ( H gsum ( x e. N |-> ( Q ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d K x $.
$d N x $.
$d Q x $.
$d R x $.
$d ph x $.
